 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָאַר‎</span>] **verb** only **Pi\`el** exact meaning uncertain; probably (from context) ==abhor, spurn== ([[BDB#De|De]] compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***abhor***, but this is med. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִאֵר‎</span> [[Lam.2.7|Lam 2:7]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקְדָּשׁוֺ‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָנַת‎</span>); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵאַרְתָּה‎</span> [[Ps.89.40|Ps 89:40]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרית עַבְדְּךָ‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִלֵּל‎</span>, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָנַח‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָאַס‎</span> v[[Ps.89.39|Ps 89:39]] doubts cast on text by [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נאץ‎</span>), [[BDB#Now|Now]], [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]<sup>[[Lam.2.7|Lam 2:7]]</sup>).
